description: This table contains the list of visit programs associated with temporary charge transactions.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the charge session record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_VISIT_PROGRAMS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient visit programs associated with the temporary charge session.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
